Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends authorization for the county of Fulton to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends authorization for the county of Fulton to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending authorization for the county of Fulton to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
